attributes.action: Sack the Prime minister and Chancellor
attributes.additional_details: Use the minstrel code to have them removed from office!
attributes.background: We the people need to be led by law abiding citizens, by refusing to abide by the minstrel code and not resign they are making a mockery of the whole system. You lead by example so do the honourable thing and resign!

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
